cielo

By P-ful, Inc.

Share folders like your personal folders

Our cieloFolder is an personalized shared folder.
The cieloFolder supports your better collaboration.
With cieloFolder, feel free to change its structure and rename entities in it.
Work easier and smarter.
We are looking forward to staring our service soon.

Personalized Shared Folder

A Personalized Shared Folder is a new form of a shared folder that each collaborator is able to organize the folder structures and file names in his or her own needs.

Integrated Cloud Storage

An Integrated Cloud Storage is a centralized management console for the cloud services such as Dropbox, Google Drive, and Microsoft OneDrive.

Seamless Collaboration

Seamless Collaboration is a set of techniques allowing an user to collaborate with each other using the Personalized Shared folders and the Integrated Cloud Storage.

Personalized Shared Folder


cieloFolder shares only the content of each file, not a file or a folder itself. The centralized repository has the contents and each collaborator can organize the structures in the device.

Amy and Peter have the same contents of the files, but they can organize their folders in their own way.


Integrated Cloud Storage



If you are using two or more cloud services, you should install all the client softwares to synchronize the files. But with cieloFolder, you don't have to do so.

cieloFolder manages all your scattered accounts for the cloud stroage sevices such as Dropbox, Google Drive, and Microsoft OneDrive.


cieloFolder will come at Summer.
